title: Amy’s Kids Worried About Their Moms + Brett Eldredge Shares New Music + The Real Story About A Girl + A Listener Plays “Guess The Narrator”
itunes:title: Amy’s Kids Worried About Their Moms + Brett Eldredge Shares New Music + The Real Story About A Girl + A Listener Plays “Guess The Narrator”
description:
Amy tells us that her kids have been asking questions about their biological mothers in Haiti. They're worried about them because of the coronavirus pandemic. Brett Eldredge talks to us about his new song 'Gabrielle' and shares the real story about the girl he wrote it for. Plus, a listener plays “Guess The Narrator” for a chance to win some money and a prize from Audible!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
